page.title: 08The use of the River Deben
page.content: As well as the Sailing Club, the river is widely used by others:{British {Telecom Sailing Club}moor their dinghies here, and{Deben Canoe Club use it as a convenient stopping place on trips from their base at Woodbridge. Many small craft are moored on the river, with dinghies being used to reach them, making navgation difficult sometimes.There is a{narrow channel which snakes from side to side up the river, marked clearly by buoys.Just up river from Wald. , there is an island, providing a short cut at high tide for the fearless. The{pleasure boat Jahain}carries passengers on pleasure trips up + down the river. It is a popular river with windsurfers , water skiers and the {Thames Barge Sailing Club}amongst the users.
